annotated sentences.containing: one or two location entity mentions
annotated sentences.from sentence: SentiHood currently contains annotated sentences containing one or two location entity mentions .

5215 sentences.from sentence: 2 Sen-tiHood contains 5215 sentences with 3862 sentences containing a single location and 1353 sentences containing multiple ( two ) locations .

dominant for.from sentence: " Positive " sentiment is dominant for aspects such as dining and shopping .

aspect touristy.from sentence: The general aspect is the most frequent aspect with over 2000 sentences while aspect touristy has occurred in less than 100 sentences .

total number of opinions ( 5920 ).from sentence: Notice that since each sentence can contain one or more opinions , the total number of opinions ( 5920 ) in the dataset is higher than the number of sentences .

Location entity names.from sentence: Location entity names are masked by location1 and location 2 in the whole dataset , so the task does not involve identification and segmentation of the named entities .
